CustomField.description: **System Calculated** Masked account number displaying X for all but the last four characters which are visible. Example: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-1234
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated** Masked account number displaying X for all but the last four characters which are visible. Example: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-1234
CustomField.label: Number
